text: Ok I opened a discussion with our designer and front-end engineer about these suggestions. Any thoughts about functionality at the api level?
3 teams in a bus may be the best split
What do you mean on the api level

All table actions are built using API calls: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/hubdb/hubdb_overview> . Developing new features typically involves first supporting a new api call  or extending the functionality of an existing one before any work is done on the front-end application.
AH, I'm sorry, I was reading the wrong conversation above. I thought we were talking about permission roles
lol I'd love an api call to adjust user permissions! I could easily fire it off every time we get hooked into a new account
